titles.title: Capital Gains Tax Reduction bill
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a 30-percent capital gains deduction for both corporate and noncorporate taxpayers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a 30 percent income tax deduction for the net capital gain of both corporate and noncorporate taxpayers.
